input.sentences: there were a lot of powerful speakers at today 's talk .
they showed a lot of passion .
however | the panel was not particularly a diverse one .
that being said | they were all leaders in their fields .
and they did agree to take questions afterwards .
output.sentences: At work today we watched some powerful speakers talk about ways we could improve how we operate our business.
A lot of the experts spoke with genuine passion.
The panel of professionals included people from some very diverse backgrounds.
They were all leaders in each of their respective fields.
Once all the speakers were finished they agreed to answer our questions.
